      • twoDimensionalArraySort

        public static double[][] twoDimensionalArraySort(double[][] Array,
                                                 int ArraySize,
                                                 int column)
        Returns an array where the row starting with the highest value is swapped into the first position.

        Also works for other column by use of column

        Parameters:
        Array - Input array
        ArraySize - Size of the input array
        column - Criteria for where to sort
        Returns:
        A sorted Array of equal size
